title: Integration with third-party products
content:
Service Management supports integration with the following third-party products. For support matrix information about these integrations, visit the Integration Central website.

  • You can also use Connect-It to integrate with other products. For more information about the Connect-It configuration, see Integrate with Connect-It.
  • It's recommended to create a distinct user for each integration.
  • For all integrations that use OPB, you need to create only one integration user for the OPB agent to access Service Management.
  • An integration user that's defined in Service Management consumes a license unless it has the "Integration user" role defined in Suite Administration. 


Third-party integrations

You can integrate the suite with the following third-party products.

Product Description Method Documentation
Asana Enables you to import user entitlements from Asana. Integration Studio Integrate with Asana for SAM
Atlassian Confluence Enables you to index knowledge from Confluence. IDOL connector and OPB Index knowledge from Confluence

Atlassian Jira

Enables you to set up a bi-directional integration with Jira to submit Defects or Enhancement requests from Service Portal or other Service Management record types. The integration also allows you to keep the data in sync in both systems.

Integration Studio

 Integrate with Atlassian Jira
AWS Management & Governance Enables you to import AWS billing data and cloud accounts to support the cloud cost reports and cloud account management features of Cloud Cost Reporting. Integration Studio & 

Cloud Cost Data Provider

 Integrate with AWS for Cloud Cost Reporting
Business Intelligence (BI) Enables you to define the fields and relationships that are synced for a record type when integrating with an external business intelligence system.

REST API

 To perform the integration, see Business Intelligence integration.

For detailed information on the BI integration REST API, see Business Intelligence integration API.
Computer Telephony Integration (CTI) Enables Service Management to automatically display information about the caller and details about the caller's service and support requests on the Live Support page when agents receive a telephone call.  CTI Configure Live Support with CTI
Datadog Enables you to forward Datadog incidents to SMAX and schedule downtime in Datadog. Integration Studio Integrate with Datadog
External email service Enables you to request appropriate knowledge articles, create requests, add comments, and accept solutions to existing requests without logging in, using specially prepared email messages to do so.  OPB Configure email integration
GitHub actions Enables you to integrate with GitHub actions, to run workflows and get their status. Integration Studio Github Actions connector
Jenkins Enables you to integrate with Jenkins, to get builds and trigger Jenkins Jobs. Integration Studio Jenkins connector
LDAP Enables you to synchronize user and group records from LDAP with Service Management.

OPB

 To perform the synchronization integration, see Integrate with LDAP.
Lucid Enables you to import Lucidchart and Lucidspark user entitlements. Integration Studio Integrate with Lucid for SAM
Meta WhatsApp Enables you to proactively inform users about important issues in your environment. Integration Studio Integrate with WhatsApp
Microsoft 365
  • Enables you to create requests based on emails that users send to a designated Microsoft 365 mailbox.
  • Enables you to import user entitlement data and license consumption data from Microsoft 365.
 Integration Studio
  • Microsoft 365 email integration
  • Integrate with Microsoft 365 for SAM
Microsoft Azure Active Directory (AD) Enables you to import users and groups (as well as user-group relationships) from Azure AD into Service Management. Integration Studio Integrate with Azure AD
Microsoft Azure Billing Enables you to import Azure billing data and cloud accounts to support the cloud cost reports and cloud account management features of Cloud Cost Reporting. Integration Studio & 

Cloud Cost Data Provider

 Integrate with Azure for Cloud Cost Reporting
Microsoft Azure DevOps

Enables you to set up a bi-directional integration with Azure DevOps to submit Defects or Enhancement requests from Service Portal or other Service Management record types. The integration also allows you to keep the data in sync in both systems.

Integration Studio

Integrate with Azure DevOps
Microsoft Intune Enables you to import devices/endpoints from Intune into the SACM module. Integration Studio Integrate with Microsoft Intune
Microsoft SharePoint Enables you to index knowledge from SharePoint sites. IDOL connector and OPB Index knowledge from SharePoint
Microsoft Teams  Enables you to use Microsoft Teams to support bot-based interactions, and to send notification messages to Teams channels or private / group chats. Integration Studio Integrate with Microsoft Teams
OpenAI ChatGPT Enables you to send questions to ChatGPT and get the response in the Discussions tab within the ticket.

Integration Studio

Integrate with OpenAI ChatGPT
Salesforce Sales Cloud Enables you to import user entitlement data and license consumption data from Salesforce. Integration Studio Integrate with Salesforce Sales Cloud for SAM
Salesforce Slack Enables you to send messages to the configured Slack channel to inform users about important issues in your environment. Integration Studio Integrate with Salesforce Slack
SAP Solution Manager Enables case exchange between SMAX and an external Service Provider that uses SAP Solution Manager as a ticketing tool. OPB and Operations Orchestration (OO) Integrate with SAP Solution Manager

SAP SuccessFactors

Enables you to achieve HR-related use cases, such as checking holiday balance, new employee onboarding, and so on.

Integration Studio

Integrate with SAP SuccessFactors
Smartsheet Enables you to import user entitlement data from Smartsheet. Integration Studio Integrate with Smartsheet for SAM
Webex Enables you to import user entitlement data and license consumption data from Webex. Integration Studio Integrate with Webex for SAM
